outputName.title: Auto-populate from
outputName.description: The name of the predefined Destination that will be used to auto-populate collector settings.

bucket.title: Bucket name
bucket.description: Name of the bucket to collect from. This value can be a constant or a JavaScript expression that can only be evaluated at init time. E.g. referencing a Global Variable: `myBucket-${C.vars.myVar}`.

path.title: Path
path.description: The directory from which to collect data. Templating is supported, e.g.: myDir/${datacenter}/${host}/${app}/. Time-based tokens are also supported, e.g.: myOtherDir/${_time:%Y}/${_time:%m}/${_time:%d}/

extractors.title: Path extractors

key.title: Token
key.description: A token from the template path, e.g.: epoch

expression.title: Extractor expression
expression.description: JS expression that receives token under "value" variable, and evaluates to populate event fields, e.g.: {date: new Date(+value*1000)}

extractors.description: Allows using template tokens as context for expressions that enrich discovery results. E.g.: given a template /path/${epoch}, an extractor under key "epoch" with an expression {date: new Date(+value*1000)}, will enrich discovery results with a human readable "date" field

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Google Cloud Storage service endpoint. If empty, the endpoint will default to https://storage.googleapis.com.

disableTimeFilter.title: Disable time filter
disableTimeFilter.description: Used to disable collector event time filtering when a date range is specified.

maxBatchSize.title: Max Batch Size (objects)
maxBatchSize.description: Maximum number of metadata objects to batch before recording as results.

authType.title: Authentication method
authType.description: Enter account credentials manually, or select a secret that references your credentials.

serviceAccountCredentials.title: Service account credentials
serviceAccountCredentials.description: Contents of Google Cloud service account credentials (JSON keys) file. To upload a file, click the upload button at this field's upper right.

textSecret.title: Service account credentials (text secret)
textSecret.description: Select (or create) a stored text secret that references your credentials.
